extendedInfo.description: Uninstall the old fashion design guide, before installing this versionFashion design and construction guide contains a lengthily and detailed glossary and step-by-step guide to the fundamentals of making clothes and garments. Clear full colour images of everything from sewing tips, construction techniques, sewing machine advise, accessories and much much more. Contains tips and tutorials, this App is a valuable aid to students, fashion designers, seamstresses, dressmakers, tailors, hobbyists and art and crafts. âNO ADS âWORKS OFFLINE â80+ IMAGES â110+ PAGESThis application categories areas of garment construction efficiently, leading to clear definitions and step-by-step processes. This App includes:SEWING MACHINEâ Machine Needles  - Ball Point  - Sharp Point    - Wedge Pointâ Presser Feet  - Piping Foot  - Zipper Foot  - Walking Foot  - Darning Foot  - Zigzag Footâ Accessories  - Ruffler  - Seam Guideâ Overlocker MachineSEAMS AND STITCHESâ Seams   - Lock Stitch   - Top Stitch   - Bound Edge   - Turned Under   - French Seam   - 3-Thread Overlock   - 4-Thread Overlock   - Cover Stitchâ Stitches   - Button Hole   - Lock Stitch   - Scallop   - Overcast   - Zigzag   - Straight   - Straight Stretch   - Satin Stitch   - Blind StitchCONSTRUCTION TOOLSâ Measuring   - Seam Guide   - Tape Measure   - Pattern Master   - Meter Rulerâ Marking    - Tailors Chalk   - Tracing Wheel   - Graphite Pencilâ Cutting   - Tailors Shears   - Pinking Shears   - Seam Ripperâ Handsewing   - Dressmaker Pins   - Pin Cushion   - Quilting Pins   - Safety Pins   - Betweens Needle   - Embroidary Needle   - Sharp Needleâ Pressing Tools   - Sleave Board   - Tailors Ham   - Seam Roll   - Point PresserFABRIC TYPESâIdentifying    - Cotton   - Linen   - Silk    - Wool   - Rayon   - acetate   - SyntheticsâSewing Fabric Types   - Stretchy   - Slippery   - Sheer and Lace   - Textured   - Striped, Plaid and PrintsTECHNIQUES AND FINISHESâSeam Finishes   - Stitch and Pink   - Zigzag   - Turn and StitchâHemming Methods   - Hand Blind Hem   - Machine Blind Hem   - Double Fold Hem   - Top Stitched   - Narrow Hem   - Fused HemâPleats   - Box Pleats   - Inverted Box Pleats   - Knife PleatsâDartsâEdges and Trims   - Bias Binding   - Hand Stitched Trim   - Piping   - Gathers   - RufflesCLOSURES AND FASTENINGSâZipper Types   - Chunky Plastic Zip   - Regular Plastic Zip   - Invisible Zip   - Metal ZipâButton Types   - Sew Through Buttons   - Shank ButtonsâOther Fastenings   - Toggle   - Velcro   - Hook and Eye   - Frogs   - Poppers/Snaps

reviews.title: A bit miffed...
reviews.comment: Got to pay again for the new app. The old one is fab so I don\'t mind too much, but it\'s a bit cheeky...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful!
reviews.comment: Great app! Very happy with this new version. Kind of a mini encyclopedia of sewing tools, techniques, stitches, etc. with good quality pictures on nearly every page. Detailed and easy to use. Definitely worth the $4.03!
reviews.author: A Google User
